result.execSummary:
The defendant Truman Simmons Sr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: EACH COUNT: Pay all mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges including: DNA surcharges within 1 year of today's date, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Court WAIVED all Non-mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges due to inability to pay. Cash bai applied.
Concurrent with: EACH OTHER AS TO BOTH COUNTS; TIME SERVED DISPOSITIONS

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Truman Simmons Sr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Due to not following the payment plan agreement, specifically payment(s) were missed, the payment plan has been ended and the failure to pay action has been enforced.
Assessment for Attorney Fees in the amount of $720.00 entered as ordered by the court on 07/30/15 to pay $50.00 monthly.  Final payment due by 11/01/16. Failure to pay is a Civil Judgment.
Signed & Filed, Affidavit and Order for Payment of Attorney Fees and Costs.

Sentencing Proceeded. Statements by parties and defendant.
AS TO COUNT 1
The court sentenced the defendant to 2 DAYS in the House of Correction, with credit for 2 DAYS time served. This is a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION, concurrent to Count 2. Pay all MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges including: DNA & DV surcharges within 1 YEAR of today's date, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Court WAIVED all NON-Mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges due to inability to pay. Court advised defendant of right to seek post conviction relief.


AS TO COUNT 2
The court sentenced the defendant to 2 DAYS in the House of Correction, with credit for 2 DAYS time served. This is a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION, concurrent to Count 1.
 Pay all MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges including: DNA surcharges within 1 YEAR of today's date, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Court WAIVED all NON-Mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges due to inability to pay. Court advised defendant of right to seek post conviction relief.

Filed: 
-Pretrial Sentence Credit
-Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief

AS TO COUNTS 1 & 2 PER AMENDED CRIMINAL COMPLAINT
Defendant changes plea(s) to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to plea, advised of Constitutional Rights and the maximum penalties. Court found that the defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived rights.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights form, received and filed. Parties stipulate to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea(s).  Court found defendant GUILTY and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.

Defendant Truman Simmons in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Defendant Truman Simmons in custody.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
AS TO COUNT 1
Court reviewed the Amended Criminal Complaint and found probable cause. Amended Complaint, Received & Filed. Copy of Amended Complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty. Amended Compliant adds COUNT 2: Bail Jumping (Misdemeanor), contrary to Wis. Stat. 946.19(1)(a), a class A Misdemeanor.

Defendant Truman Simmons in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CASE RECALLED. Court held in chambers conference with both state and defense counsel, victim/witness advocate, and 2 MCSD Deputies. State advised the court that there have been new allegations of violating the no contact order in the hallway outside of court. Court vacated the trial date. Discussion regarding bail. Court amended Cash Bail to $750.00 with all ordered conditions remaining in effect. Court set matter for a Plea Hearing in branch 23.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Truman Simmons in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for Jury Trial. 1st call, parties are ready to proceed. Case passed to address court calendar.

Defendant Truman Simmons in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant appeared LATE in court. Court admonished defendant to appear for court on time. Defense counsel requests case be set for Jury Trial. Court advised parties that all discovery must be turned over, all witness lists and motions filed 20 DAYS in advance of the Jury Trial date. All conditions of bail remain in effect. Case adjourned for  Jury Trial to branch 23.  Jury trial scheduled for July 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
CORRECTION: Status Conference date reflects corrected day.

Defendant Truman Simmons in court PRO SE.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for Pretrial Conference.  Court conducted Indigency Hearing. Court found defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel by court. Court held colloquy with defendant. Defendant requested court appointed counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense. The court appointed attorney Michael B Plaisted, present in court, to represent defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $60.00 per hour. The court ordered the defendant repay the County at a rate of $50.00 per month starting the 1st of each month after the conclusion of the case, then the 1st of each month there after. Court advised defendant failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Signed, Distributed & Filed, Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense. Case is adjourned for a Status of Counsel date in branch 23.  Status conference scheduled for April 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
03/05/2015

Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
03/05/2015
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 03-19-2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Truman Simmons Sr
Current: 2917 N 19th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 03-03-2015)
Prior: 2917 N 19th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Any additional cash bail posted on this case to be returned to the remittur.

As an additional condition of bail:
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Wyniesha T.   AND/OR  her children    AND/OR  her place of residence    AND/OR   their place of employment/school/day care

Defendant Truman Simmons in court.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
OCCR Tape#15-042

Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Grady, Branch 23.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.  Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 23.
Clerk:  jms
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 3/3/15 @ 1:30 pm
